text:
After spending some time wondering why a particular symbolic link was not
allowed, I wrote a patch that adds one of the following reasons to the "Symbolic
link not allowed" log message:
* FollowSymLinks option not enabled
* owner doesn't match
* couldn't stat file
creator: apache@andreweland.org

text:
Please post this patch to the developer's mailing list (dev@httpd.apache.org) rather than the issues database.  Closing as INVALID.

Thanks for using Apache HTTP Server!
creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
